results.title: TEST - Star Citizen is selling virtual plots of land for up to £96 a pop
results.description: The space game, which already sells spaceships for hundreds of pounds, now lets you buy what are called Land Claim Licenses. This is a virtual certificate that entitles you to claim a parcel of land in the game - although the mechanic is not yet live.

meta.description: The space game, which already sells spaceships for hundreds of pounds, now lets you buy what are called Land Claim Licenses. This is a virtual certificate that entitles you to claim a parcel of land in the game - although the mechanic is not yet live.

results.title: Star Citizen Release Date, Trailer, & Latest News
results.description: Star Citizen could very well be the space simulator to end all space simulators - if it ever actually comes out. The game has been in development at Cloud Imperium Games, founded by Wing Commander creator Chris Roberts, since it was successfuly crowdfunded ...

results.title: Star Citizen selling plots of land for up to $120
results.description: Cloud Imperium Games, the maker of Star Citizen, is offering players the chance to buy plots of land on the planets, moons or asteroids controlled by UEE, within the game. The purpose of the land claim mechanism at this time is admitted to be for ...

results.title: Forget No Man’s Sky and Star Citizen: Is this the most ambitious game ever?
results.description: Kickstarter can be a cruel mistress. The website that allows fans to fund projects has seen a tirade of ambitious, exciting games pitches, but once the money has been pledged and the goal reached it becomes a nail-biting affair. Will the money be enough?
